articles.description: England need 35 more runs with four wickets in hand to beat India in an astonishing final Test after a barely believable fourth day was halted by rain and bad light.
articles.title: England vs India: Astonishing fifth Test goes into final day at The Oval

articles.description: Lando Norris holds off a late attack from McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri to win the Hungarian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Hungarian Grand Prix: Lando Norris holds off late Piastri attack

articles.description: Miyu Yamashita produces an almost faultless final round to hold off England's Charley Hull and win the Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl.
articles.title: Women's Open 2025: Miyu Yamashita wins first major title at Royal Porthcawl

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim on last season's difficulties, his relationship with Sir Jim Ratcliffe and his hopes for the new season.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd boss feared going to games last season during form struggles

articles.description: Netherlands defender Jorrel Hato signs seven-year contract with Chelsea after completing £37m transfer from Ajax.
articles.title: Jorrel Hato: Chelsea sign Ajax defender for £37m on seven-year contract

articles.description: Celtic begin their Scottish Premiership season with a victory, but are far from convincing as they struggle to break down a resilient St Mirren.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership LIVE: Celtic vs St Mirren radio commentary, updates & match report, BBC Sport

articles.description: Who was an "utter machine" and who was the "unluckiest player in living memory"? It's our British and Irish Lions player ratings.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025 player ratings - who impressed?

articles.description: Manchester United are prepared to sell Denmark striker Rasmus Hojlund for £30m.
articles.title: Rasmus Hojlund: Manchester United striker available for £30m

articles.description: Teenager Victoria Mboko produces the shock of the tournament to defeat top seed Coco Gauff and reach the quarter-finals of the Canadian Open in Montreal.
articles.title: Canadian Open: Victoria Mboko stuns Coco Gauff to reach quarter-finals in Montreal

articles.description: Tottenham boss Thomas Frank fears midfielder James Maddison has suffered a 'bad' knee injury.
articles.title: Tottenham: James Maddison suffers 'bad' injury in pre-season friendly against Newcastle
